title: Drawing, "Vigilance", 1816
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink: Vigilanza
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Woman shown seated upon bed and reading book. Putto lights lamp, another restrains crane.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Vigilance", 1816.
1816. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3246.
